p = int(raw_input())
fact = [];
fact.append(1);
for i in range(1,12):
	t = fact[i-1]*i;
	fact.append(t);
for q in range(p):	
	arr = map(int,raw_input().split());
	k = int(raw_input());
	arr.sort();
	arr.reverse();
	n = 0;
	i = k-1;
	while i >= 0:
		if(arr[i] == arr[k-1]):
			n+=1;
		i-=1;
	r = 0;
	i = k;
	while i < len(arr):
		if(arr[i] == arr[k-1]):
			r+=1;
		i+=1;
	n+=r;
	r = n-r;
	# print n,r;
	t = fact[n];
	s = fact[r]*fact[n-r];
	t/=s;
	print t;
